code: import React from"react";import{useLocation,Link}from"react-router-dom";import'./IndividualPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PaintingPage(){var location=useLocation();var state=location.state;var images=null;console.log(state);if(state.Continent==='Europe'){images=require.context('../../Paintings/Europe-paintings',true);}else if(state.Continent==='Asia'){images=require.context('../../Paintings/Asia-paintings',true);}else if(state.Continent==='America'){images=require.context('../../Paintings/America-paintings',true);}var imgsrc=images("./".concat(state.paintingsrc,".jpg"));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:state&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"head-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"pictureStyling",src:imgsrc}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"textContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"titleblok",children:state.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"textBlok",children:state.text})]})]})});}
